WindowControlsOverlayGeometryChangeEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The WindowControlsOverlayGeometryChangeEvent interface of the Window Controls Overlay API is passed to when the size or visibility of a desktop Progress Web App's title bar region changes.
NOTE Experimental The titlebarAreaRect read-only property of the interface is a representing the position and size of the area occupied by the title bar in a desktop-installed Progressive Web App.
NOTE Experimental The visible read-only property of the interface is a boolean flag that indicates whether the window controls overlay is visible or not in a desktop-installed Progressive Web App.

remarks.para: If the user opts-out of the Window Controls Overlay feature, the default title bar appears and the window controls buttons do not appear as an overlay, in which case the visible flag is false.

WindowControlsOverlayGeometryChangeEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The WindowControlsOverlayGeometryChangeEvent() constructor returns a new object, representing the current geometry of a desktop Progressive Web App's title bar area.
